citations.desc: INSTITUTIONAL ANIMAL CARE AND USE COMMITTEE (IACUC).
citations.narrative:
Item IACUC 2.31 c 3
At the time of inspection it was noted that the IACUC has not performed a semiannual report to the Institutional
Official for almost a year. This includes that program of humane care and use was not performed nor was a facility
inspection performed. Each research facility needs to perform a semiannual report with its submission to the
Institutional Official as least once every 6 months
Facility needs to insure its semiannual report is completed at lease once every 6 months.
Correct from this day 12/2/14
Exit interview conducted at the time of inspection
